businessheroinfo.Description: Courses under this category involve Sales, Customer Experience, Digital Marketing, Video Editing, Motion & Still Graphics, and Admin Digital Tools.

business.title: Sales
business.description: Find out what makes sales people effective, and learn specific strategies for prospecting and product positioning, and developing a sales process

business.title: Customer Experience
business.description: Find out what makes sales people effective, and learn specific strategies for prospecting and product positioning, and developing a sales process

business.title: Digital Marketing
business.description: Learn today's online marketing techniques and find out how to build a successful online marketing campaign for all digital channels: search, video, social, email, and display.

business.title: Video Editing
business.description: Video editing skills enable you to arrange and alter video shots in order to create a cohesive structure.

business.title: Motion & Still Graphics
business.description: The use of diverse visual effects, animation, and other cinematic techniques to bring life to their creations.

business.title: Admin Digital Tools
business.description: Communication Tools, Project Management Tools, File-Sharing Tools, and Calendar/Schedule Management.
